articles.title: Day of Sun and February 16 to Be Commemorated in Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Sun and February 16 to Be Commemorated in Equatorial Guinea 
   Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The Equatorial Guinean national preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was inaugurated with due ceremony at the building of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea on Jan. 26.
 The minister for Envoys of the Presidential Office, who is member of the National Council of the party and a special advisor for political and electoral affairs of the National Office of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee decided to hold various events on the two occasions.

articles.title: Meeting of June 15 U.S. Regional Committee Held
articles.content:
Meeting of June 15 U.S. Regional Committee Held 
   Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The 5th meeting of co-chairmen of the U.S. Regional Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration was held in Los Angeles on Jan. 27.
 The meeting discussed the matters related to the first regular meeting of the committee to be held in Los Angeles on March 17 and its action program for 2007 and others.
